Move customer landing pages into their own directories with index.html
files, enabling future subdomain routing:
- enterprise.arbinq.com -> enterprise/
- small-business.arbinq.com -> small-business/
- developers.arbinq.com -> developers/
- agencies.arbinq.com -> agencies/

Update all internal links to use directory-based paths.

EOF
\)")

single-file change. The script handles relative paths automatically
for both main and subdomain pages.

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
